context: Hello! What kind of movies are you into?
hi I love awful 80s movies. Something like One Crazy Summer (1986) or Better Off Dead (1985) Any good recomendations?
resp: Oh, yes...Love both of those. How about something like Porky's (1981)? My husband and I re-watched Police Academy (1984) recently. It really is a hoot and makes for a fun nostalgic trip.
